title: F/s two max stein postcards sold
author: WillowGrove

posts.post_title: F/s two max stein postcards sold
posts.post_content:
From what I can find, these are two of the tougher ones from the set.
These are from 1913.  Evers was only manager in 1913 and in the other card, Mtichell was only on the Cubs for 1913 before being waived  on 7/29/13.

Condition is good.  On Five Cubs - a light crease on Shulte's (sic) pants.  Evers has crease upper left corner and lower right.

Price is firm.  If interested please email me at   [url]peterfish56@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks.  peter
